items.name: id
items.info: id of the coincidence hit

items.name: sector
items.info: sector of BAND

items.name: layer
items.info: layer or column id of BAND

items.name: component
items.info: paddle or row id of BAND

items.name: energy
items.info: Geometric mean of L and R ADC

items.name: time
items.info: Meantime from TDC from L and R hit (ns)

items.name: x
items.info: X coor (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: y
items.info: Y coor (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: z
items.info: Z coor (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: ex
items.info: X coor uncertainty (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: ey
items.info: Y coor uncertainty (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: ez
items.info: Z coor uncertainty (cm) of coincidence hit

items.name: timeFadc
items.info: Meantime from FADC from L and R hit (ns)

items.name: difftime
items.info: Calibrated time difference of L and R on a bar(ns) from TDC

items.name: difftimeFadc
items.info: Calibrated time difference of L and R on a bar(ns) from FADC

items.name: indexLpmt
items.info: index of rawhit from Left PMT, starts at zero

items.info: index of rawhit from Right PMT, starts at zero
